cp.name: Creator Points
cp.description: Creator Points show up in the garage. Click the Creator Points icon to refresh. (Only available to people logged in)

demons.name: Demons
demons.description: Demons show up in the garage.

no-lock-hint.name: Remove Lock Hint
no-lock-hint.description: Removes the "Tap lock icon for more info!" text.

top-buttons.name: Mod Options
top-buttons.description: Adds a top bar of buttons (requires Remove Lock Hint setting enabled)

feedback.name: Feedback Button
feedback.description: Disable this to remove the feedback button.

kofi.name: Ko-Fi Button
kofi.description: Disable this to remove the Ko-Fi button.

demon-keys.name: Demon Keys
demon-keys.description: Demon Keys show up in the garage.

achievement-count.name: Achievement Count (WIP)
achievement-count.description: Percentage of completed Achievements show up in the garage.

icon-hack.name: Icon + Color Hack
icon-hack.description: You can use every icon and color in the game.

shops-shortcut.name: Shops Shortcut
shops-shortcut.description: Replaces default shop button with a menu with all shop buttons

issues.info: Report issues to OmgRod on GitHub and they may be fixed in a future release.
